title: Regency Christmas Wishes: The Lucky Coin / Following Yonder Star / the Merry Magpie / Best Wishes / Let Nothing You Dismay
description: Ring in the holiday season with five brand-new tales from five Regency belles... Celebrate the joy, warmth, and magic of Christmas in Regency England with this all-new collection of stories from five award-winning and bestselling authors...
author: Sandra Heath
